com.inherentgames

Class BBButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inherentgames.BBButton

  • public class BBButton
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Tyler A class that keeps track of on screen 'Buttons'; some declarations are unclickable. Makes re-sizing and moving buttons on screen (such as fireButton, pauseButton, etc.) very simple. It is also being used for the score bar, which isn't necessarily a button, so the naming convention is a bit skewed. Future implementation could extend Button and add an OnClickListener() so as to easily handle clicking the button rather than using the includes() function.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BBButton

        public BBButton(int x,
        int y,
        int width,
        int height,
        java.lang.String passiveImage,
        java.lang.String activeImage)
        Constructor for BBButton
        Parameters:
        x - - the x position of the center of the button in pixels
        y - - the y position of the center of the button in pixels
        width - - the width of the button in pixels
        height - - the height of the button in pixels
        passiveImage - - a string for the image displayed when the button isn't being pressed
        activeImage - - a string for the image displayed when the button is being pressed

    • Method Detail

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(int x,
               int y)
        Manually set the position of the button if it needs to be moved (perhaps for left handed mode?)
        Parameters:
        x - - the x position of the center of the button in pixels
        y - - the y position of the center of the button in pixels

      • swapState

        public boolean swapState()
        changes the state of the button (passive to active or vice versa) and sets the image to display accordingly.
        Returns:
        boolean equivalent to isActive

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Find out if the button is currently being pressed (active) or not
        Returns:
        - true if button is active, false if passive

      • includes

        public boolean includes(int x,
               int y)
        Used to determine if a certain point on screen is within the button. Useful for determining whether the button has been clicked, but could be deprecated if the BBButton class extends Button, and an OnClickListener() is added.
        Parameters:
        x - - the x position of the center of the button in pixels
        y - - the y position of the center of the button in pixels
        Returns:
        - true if the point given is within the button's reaches, false if not
